name: Title format
criteria_details: Sentence case for titles and headings

name: References included
criteria_details: All statements must be supported by reliable sources

name: Lead summary
criteria_details: Lead must summarize the article concisely

name: Infobox usage
criteria_details: Infobox must be right-aligned and summarize key facts

name: External links relevance
criteria_details: External links must be relevant and appropriate

name: Further reading selectivity
criteria_details: Further reading section must be selective

name: See also relevance
criteria_details: See also links must be directly related to the article content

name: Category placement
criteria_details: Categories must be placed at the very end of the article
